data.title: Questacon - National Science and Technology Centre
data.meta_description: Discover what local experts have to say about Questacon - National Science and Technology Centre with honest reviews, helpful notes and photos.
data.text: "Attractions for Children and Families: Hands-On Exhibits: Dive into a world of discovery with over 200 interactive exhibits that ignite curiosity and inspire wonder. From controlling robots to experimenting with physics, there's a hands-on experience for every budding scientist. Q Lab: Witness live experiments and captivating science demonstrations performed by Questacon's talented staff. These interactive shows unravel the mysteries of the natural world and demonstrate scientific principles in action. Mini-Q: Designed for little scientists aged 0-6, Mini-Q is a safe and stimulating play area where toddlers can explore and experiment in a dedicated space just for them. Exciting Workshops: Participate in exciting workshops covering topics like robotics, space exploration, and chemistry. These workshops offer kids a chance to dive deeper into specific areas of interest. Sideshow Alley: Step into a world of optical illusions, mind-bending puzzles, and quirky gadgets. Sideshow Alley is a fun and interactive space that challenges your perception and intellect. Earthquake House: Experience the thrill of an earthquake in a safe and controlled environment. Kids will learn about the science behind seismic activity while having an unforgettable adventure. Awesome Earth: Explore our planet's geological wonders, including volcanoes, earthquakes, and natural disasters, through immersive exhibits and simulations. Spectacular Science Shows: Don't miss the spectacular science shows held daily at Questacon. From exploding liquids to fiery reactions, these shows are both educational and entertaining. Tips & Tricks Questaconâ€™s layout encourages you to start from the top floor and walk down the internal spiral concourse. If travelling with small children, start from the bottom, as this is where the most age appropriate attractions are, including Mini Q. Mini Q has a maximum person limit. During busy periods including school holidays, staff manage this by rotating people through every 30 minutes. You can however, immediately queue up again. Book tickets online ahead of time. Check out their reciprocal membership programs in case you qualify. "
